title: Science Teacher Moral-Flexible Competency Development Course Using Cultural Philosophy and Adaptive Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific subject knowledge and experience in utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners are pre-service or in-service teachers who require case-based learning experiences utilizing Chengyu (four-character idioms) to enhance moral judgment and flexible instructional design skills in science education settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply moral principles extracted from Chengyu (four-character idioms) to science lesson design
Learners can develop learner-tailored science education scenarios using AI-based LMS systems
Learners can create science education modules reflecting cultural philosophy through project-based assessments and analyze implementation results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
